Player History
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles on 3/3/1986 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 5/3/1986 with a Tender Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 8/29/1986 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 6 days...
Traded from Los Angeles to Texas on 8/1/1988 (Going to TEX: 3B Craig Grebeck, P Tim Scott. Going to LAD: SS Greg Gagne, 2B Johnny Ray)...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/5/1989, off Mike Schooler (SEA)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/15/1989, off Dave Righetti (NYY)...
2/2/1992: Gets a new one-year contract worth $350,000 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 5/1/1992 with a Pulled Anterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 6-7 weeks...
